record.properties: Top = 240 Left = 23 Width = 1410 Height = 493 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"

Top = 296 Left = 983 Height = 162 Width = 107 Alias = "mr_instances1" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_instances" Name = "Cursor8"
Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "MODS" noavatar = 0 gridrowcolor = 0 mr_loader = mr_iguid = uniqueid = 0F9305FFE5CB42EBA6804161CA0FFAC8 Name = "mr_mods" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Destroy *!* destroy
Close Tables All ENDPROC PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
Thisform.noavatar = Filetostr(Thisform.apppath + 'res\noimage.png')
Thisform.mr_setinstance(_inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', Replicate('9', 32)))
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getcursedata *!* mr_getcursedata
Lparameters phash, ptable
If Seek(m.phash, 'mr_files', 'hash') = .T.
_logwrite('UPDATE FILE DATA START', mr_files.aid)
Replace aid With mr_files.aid In m.ptable Replace fid1 With mr_files.fid In m.ptable Replace aname With mr_files.aname In m.ptable Replace aauthname With mr_files.aauthname In m.ptable Replace gver1 With mr_files.gver In m.ptable Replace rtypename1 With mr_files.rtypename In m.ptable Replace filedate1 With mr_files.filedate In m.ptable Replace loader1 With mr_files.foldername In m.ptable
*!* SAVE LOADER TO BE USED WHEN SEARCHING FOR NEW FILES
If Not Empty(mr_files.foldername)
Thisform.mr_loader = mr_files.foldername
Endif
_logwrite('UPDATE FILE DATA END', mr_files.aid)
Endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getcursedatascan *!* mr_getcursedatascan
Local iguid
m.iguid = Thisform.mr_iguid
Select 'mr_mods1'
Scan For mr_mods1.iguid == m.iguid
DoEvents
Thisform.mr_getcursedata(mr_mods1.hash1, 'mr_mods1')
Endscan
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getfolderdatascan *!* mr_getfolderdatascan
Local afiles[1], filelen1, filename1, filespec, fileunc, iguid, hash1, ifolder, lnx, md5, ncount Local orecord
If Empty(Thisform.mr_iguid)
_logwrite('NO INSTANCE SELECTED')
Return
Endif
_logwrite('SCAN START')
m.iguid = Thisform.mr_iguid
Select 'mr_mods1'
*!* RESET iguid OF EXISTING RECORDS TO REUSE THEM
Scatter Blank Name m.orecord
m.orecord.iguid = 'XXX'
Scan For mr_mods1.iguid == m.iguid
Gather Name m.orecord
Endscan
*!* SCAN FOLDER FOR FILES
m.ifolder = mr_instances.ifolder
m.filespec = Addbs(m.ifolder) + '*.*'
m.ncount = Adir(afiles, m.filespec, '', 1)
For m.lnx = 1 To m.ncount
m.filename1 = m.afiles(m.lnx, 1)
If Not Inlist(Upper(Justext(m.filename1)), 'JAR', 'DISABLED')
Loop
Endif
m.fileunc = Addbs(m.ifolder) + m.filename1
_logwrite(m.fileunc)
m.filelen1 = m.afiles(m.lnx, 2)
*m.filedate1 = Fdate(m.fileunc, 1)
*!* m.md5 = _MD5HashFile(m.fileunc)
*!* If Seek(m.md5, 'mr_md5', 'md5') = .T.
*!* _logwrite('MD5:', m.md5)
*!* m.hash1 = mr_md5.hash
*!* Else
m.hash1 = mr_fingerprint(m.fileunc)
*!* Insert Into 'mr_md5'('hash', 'md5') Values(m.hash1, m.md5)
*!* Endif
Select 'mr_mods1'
*!* SEARCH FOR RECORD MATCH AND REUSE
If Seek('XXX', 'mr_mods1', 'IGUID') = .F.
Insert Into 'mr_mods1' From Memvar
Else
Replace ; mr_mods1.iguid With m.iguid, ; mr_mods1.filename1 With m.filename1, ; mr_mods1.filelen1 With m.filelen1, ; mr_mods1.hash1 With m.hash1 In 'mr_mods1'
Endif
Endfor
_logwrite('SCAN END')
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getnewverdata *!* mr_getnewverdata
Lparameters paid, pfid, ploader, ptable
Local lnx
If m.paid > 0
_logwrite('GET NEW FILE DATA START', mr_files.aid)
*!* TRY THE SEARCH 3 TIMES. FIRST USING THE LOADER PARAM, THEN *!* USING 'FABRIC' AND THEN 'FORGE'
For m.lnx = 1 To 2
Select Top 1 * From mr_fileversions ; Where mr_fileversions.gverlong >= mr_instances.gverlong1 ; And mr_fileversions.gverlong <= mr_instances.gverlong2 ; And mr_fileversions.aid = m.paid ; And mr_fileversions.loader == m.ploader ; And mr_fileversions.fid >= m.pfid ; Order By mr_fileversions.gverlong Desc, mr_fileversions.fid Desc ; Into Cursor 'sqlresult'
If Reccount('sqlresult') = 1 Then
Exit
Endif
m.ploader = Thisform.mr_loader
Endfor
If Reccount('sqlresult') = 1 Then
= Seek(sqlresult.fid, 'mr_files', 'fid')
Replace fid2 With mr_files.fid In m.ptable Replace filedate2 With mr_files.filedate In m.ptable Replace filelen2 With mr_files.filelen In m.ptable Replace filename2 With mr_files.filename In m.ptable Replace hash2 With mr_files.hash In m.ptable Replace rtypename2 With mr_files.rtypename In m.ptable Replace gver2 With sqlresult.gver In m.ptable Replace loader2 With mr_files.foldername In m.ptable
Endif
Use In 'sqlresult'
_logwrite('GET NEW FILE DATA END', mr_files.aid)
Endif ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getnewverdatascan *!* mr_getnewverdatascan
Select 'mr_mods1'
Scan
DoEvents
Thisform.mr_getnewverdata(mr_mods1.aid, mr_mods1.fid1, mr_mods1.loader1, 'mr_mods1')
Endscan
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_refreshcurse *!* mr_refreshcurse
Lparameters phash
Local ofp as 'fp' Of 'mr_vcl' Local aid, iguid, lnx, lnz, ofile
m.ofp = Newobject('fp', 'mr_vcl')
m.iguid = Thisform.mr_iguid
If m.phash = 0
Select 'mr_mods1'
Scan For mr_mods1.iguid == m.iguid
m.ofp.fpadd(mr_mods1.hash1)
Endscan
Else
m.ofp.fpadd(m.phash)
Endif
_logwrite('REFRESH START')
m.ofp.fppost()
If m.ofp.fpresponse = 200 Then
If Vartype(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches[1]) = 'O'
For m.lnx = 1 To Alen(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches)
m.aid = m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches[m.lnx].Id
mr_addonupdate(m.aid, .T.)
Endfor
Endif
*!* ADD DEPENDENCIES
For m.lnx = 1 To Alen(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches)
m.ofile = m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches[m.lnx].File
If Vartype(m.ofile.dependencies[1]) = 'O'
For m.lnz = 1 To Alen(m.ofile.dependencies)
mr_dependencyupdate(m.ofile.dependencies[m.lnz])
Endfor
Endif
Endfor
Endif
_logwrite('REFRESH END') ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setinstance *!* setinstance
Lparameters piguid
Thisform.mr_iguid = m.piguid
If Seek(Thisform.mr_iguid, 'mr_instances', 'iguid') = .T.
Thisform.Caption = 'MODS - ' + mr_instances.iname + ' - ' + mr_instances.ifolder
Set Filter To mr_mods.iguid == Thisform.mr_iguid In 'mr_mods'
_inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', mr_instances.iguid)
Else
Thisform.SetAll('ENABLED', .F.)
Thisform.Caption = 'MODS - NO INSTANCE SELECTED'
Set Filter To mr_mods.iguid == Replicate('9', 32) In 'mr_mods'
Endif
Go Top In 'mr_mods'
Thisform.updateui()
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui *!* updateui
Local sep
= Seek(mr_mods.aid, 'mr_avatars', 'aid')
If Empty(mr_avatars.avatar)
Thisform.imgavatar.PictureVal = Thisform.noavatar
Else
Thisform.imgavatar.PictureVal = mr_avatars.avatar
Endif
m.sep = Space(5)
Thisform.lblstatus.Caption = ; ' ' + mr_instances.iname + m.sep + mr_instances.iminecraft + m.sep + mr_instances.iloader + m.sep + ; 'MINVER: ' + mr_instances.gver1 + ' MAXVER: ' + mr_instances.gver2
Thisform.lblstatusfolder.Caption = ' ' + mr_instances.ifolder
*!* SET COLOR OF HIGHLIGHTED ROW IN GRID
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid1 # 0 And mr_mods.fid2 # 0 AND mr_mods.fid1 # mr_mods.fid2
Thisform.gridmain.HighlightBackColor = Rgb(255, 241, 118)
Case mr_mods.fid1 = 0
Thisform.gridmain.HighlightBackColor = Rgb(229, 115, 115)
Otherwise
Thisform.gridmain.HighlightBackColor = Thisform.gridmain.gethighlightbackcolor()
Endcase
ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 324 Width = 780 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Anchor = 15 Height = 276 HighlightRow = .T. Left = 12 Top = 36 Width = 936 HighlightStyle = 0 _gridcontextmenulang = en Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange Lparameters nColIndex
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC PROCEDURE Click
ENDPROC PROCEDURE getdynamicbackcolor Lparameters poColum As Column
*!* http://materialuicolors.co/?utm_source=launchers
Local lnDynamicBackColor
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid1 # 0 And mr_mods.fid1 # mr_mods.fid2
m.lnDynamicBackColor = Rgb(0xFF, 0xF9, 0xC4)
Case mr_mods.fid1 = 0
m.lnDynamicBackColor = Rgb(0xFF, 0xCD, 0xD2)
Otherwise
m.lnDynamicBackColor = This.ColumnBackColor
Endcase
Return m.lnDynamicBackColor
ENDPROC

record.properties: AutoSize = .F. FontSize = 8 Anchor = 6 BorderStyle = 0 Caption = "" Height = 15 Left = 12 Top = 479 Width = 504 Name = "lblstatus"
Top = 0 Left = 876 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "FILE2" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT FILE URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand7"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid2 > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid2))
Otherwise
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid))
Endcase
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 684 Height = 28 Width = 72 Caption = "FOLDER" ToolTipText = "OPEN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand4"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local ppidl, pszName, rgfInOut
m.pszName = Strconv(Addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + mr_mods.filename1 + Chr(0), 5)
m.ppidl = 0
If _apiSHILCreateFromPath(m.pszName, @m.ppidl, 0) = 0
_apiSHOpenFolderAndSelectItems(m.ppidl, 0, 0, 0)
_apiCoTaskMemFree(m.ppidl)
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 192 Height = 28 Width = 36 Caption = "GET 1" ToolTipText = "DOWNLOAD CURSE DATA FOR THE SELECTED MOD" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid # 0
thisform.mr_refreshcurse(mr_mods.hash1)
Thisform.mr_getcursedata(mr_mods.hash1, 'mr_mods')
Thisform.mr_getnewverdata(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid1, mr_mods.loader1, 'mr_mods')
Thisform.Refresh()
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "SCAN" ToolTipText = "SCAN MODS FOLDER FOR MOD FILES" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand6"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
If Empty(mr_instances.gverlong1) Or Empty(mr_instances.gverlong2)
Messagebox('SELECT MIN AND MAX MINECRAFT VERSIONS WITH "MINVER" AND "MAXVER" BUTTONS', 0 + 64, 'MODROBOT')
Return
Endif
_logwrite('SCAN START')
Thisform.mr_getfolderdatascan()
Thisform.mr_getcursedatascan()
Thisform.mr_getnewverdatascan()
_logwrite('SCAN END')
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 60 Height = 28 Width = 36 Caption = "GET" ToolTipText = "DOWNLOAD CURSE DATA FOR ALL MOD FILES IN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
Thisform.mr_refreshcurse(0)
Thisform.mr_getcursedatascan()
Thisform.mr_getnewverdatascan()
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 828 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "FILE1" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT FILE URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbfiles"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid1 > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid1))
Otherwise
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid))
Endcase
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 396 Height = 28 Width = 60 Caption = "INSTANCES" ToolTipText = "PICK INSTANCE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "_tbcommand3"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_instances1'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_instances1'), 0, 0, 0, 0, mr_instances1.iname + ' - ' + mr_instances1.ifolder)
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_instances1'
Thisform.mr_setinstance(mr_instances1.iguid)
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 228 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "DEPS" ToolTipText = "OPENS DEPENDENCIES FORM" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand5"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
_inisetvalue('MR_MODS_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
DO FORM mr_mod_dependencies ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 756 Height = 28 Width = 72 Caption = "OVERVIEW" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT OVERVIEW URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tboverview"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid))
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 276 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "PROJECTS" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT IN PROJECTS FORM" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand8"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
_inisetvalue('MR_ADDONS_AID', mr_mods.aid)
Do Form mr_addons ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 324 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "FILES" ToolTipText = "OPEN FILE IN FILES FORM" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "_tbcommand9"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
_inisetvalue('MR_FILES_FID', mr_mods.fid1)
Do Form mr_files ENDPROC

record.properties: Anchor = 12 Picture = ..\res\noimage1.png Stretch = 2 Height = 144 Left = 804 Top = 324 Width = 144 Name = "imgavatar"
AutoSize = .F. FontSize = 8 Anchor = 12 Alignment = 1 BorderStyle = 0 Caption = "" Height = 15 Left = 528 Top = 479 Width = 420 Name = "lblstatusfolder"
Top = 0 Left = 144 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "MAXVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MAX MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "tbvermax"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver In 'mr_instances' Replace mr_instances.gverlong2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 96 Height = 28 Width = 48 Caption = "MINVER" ToolTipText = "SETS THE MIN MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MODS" Name = "tbvermin"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver In 'mr_instances' Replace mr_instances.gverlong1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 924 Height = 28 Width = 28 FontSize = 8 Picture = ..\res\3bars.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "MENU" ZOrderSet = 21 tbalign = 2 tbautowidth = .F. tbpictureautosize = .F. tbmenuoffseth = 6 tbautofontsize = .F. tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbmenu"
